017package org.apache.juneau.msgpack;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.IOUtils.*;
020

022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.function.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;

033
034/**
035 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link MsgPackSerializer}.
036 *
037 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
038 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
039 * </ul>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
042 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/MessagePackBasics">MessagePack Basics</a>
043
044 * </ul>
045 */
046public class MsgPackSerializerSession extends OutputStreamSerializerSession {
047
048   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
049   // Static
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051
052   /**
053    * Creates a new builder for this object.
054    *
055    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
056    * @return A new builder.
057    */
058   public static Builder create(MsgPackSerializer ctx) {
059      return new Builder(ctx);
060   }
061
062   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
063   // Builder
064   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065
066   /**
067    * Builder class.
068    */
069   @FluentSetters
070   public static class Builder extends OutputStreamSerializerSession.Builder {
071
072      MsgPackSerializer ctx;
073
074      /**
075       * Constructor
076       *
077       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
078       */
079      protected Builder(MsgPackSerializer ctx) {
080         super(ctx);
081         this.ctx = ctx;
082      }
083
084      @Override
085      public MsgPackSerializerSession build() {
086         return new MsgPackSerializerSession(this);
087      }
088
089      // <FluentSetters>
090
091      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
092      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
093         super.apply(type, apply);
094         return this;
095      }
096
097      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
098      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
099         super.debug(value);
100         return this;
101      }
102
103      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
104      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
105         super.properties(value);
106         return this;
107      }
108
109      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
110      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
111         super.property(key, value);
112         return this;
113      }
114
115      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
116      public Builder unmodifiable() {
117         super.unmodifiable();
118         return this;
119      }
120
121      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
122      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
123         super.locale(value);
124         return this;
125      }
126
127      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
128      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
129         super.localeDefault(value);
130         return this;
131      }
132

134      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
135         super.mediaType(value);
136         return this;
137      }
138

140      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
141         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
142         return this;
143      }
144
145      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
146      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
147         super.timeZone(value);
148         return this;
149      }
150

154         return this;
155      }
156
157      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
158      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
159         super.javaMethod(value);
160         return this;
161      }
162
163      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
164      public Builder resolver(VarResolverSession value) {
165         super.resolver(value);
166         return this;
167      }
168
169      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
170      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
171         super.schema(value);
172         return this;
173      }
174
175      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
176      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
177         super.schemaDefault(value);
178         return this;
179      }
180
181      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
182      public Builder uriContext(UriContext value) {
183         super.uriContext(value);
184         return this;
185      }
186
187      // </FluentSetters>
188   }
189
190   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
191   // Instance
192   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
193
194   private final MsgPackSerializer ctx;
195
196   /**
197    * Constructor.
198    *
199    * @param builder The builder for this object.
200    */
201   protected MsgPackSerializerSession(Builder builder) {
202      super(builder);
203      ctx = builder.ctx;
204   }
205
206   @Override /* SerializerSession */
207   protected void doSerialize(SerializerPipe out, Object o) throws IOException, SerializeException {
208      serializeAnything(getMsgPackOutputStream(out), o, getExpectedRootType(o), "root", null);
209   }
210
211   /*
212    * Converts the specified output target object to an {@link MsgPackOutputStream}.
213    */
214   private static MsgPackOutputStream getMsgPackOutputStream(SerializerPipe out) throws IOException {
215      Object output = out.getRawOutput();
216      if (output instanceof MsgPackOutputStream)
217         return (MsgPackOutputStream)output;
218      MsgPackOutputStream os = new MsgPackOutputStream(out.getOutputStream());
219      out.setOutputStream(os);
220      return os;
221   }
222
223   /*
224    * Workhorse method.
225    * Determines the type of object, and then calls the appropriate type-specific serialization method.
226    */
227   @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes" })
228   private MsgPackOutputStream serializeAnything(MsgPackOutputStream out, Object o, ClassMeta<?> eType, String attrName, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws SerializeException {
229
230      if (o == null)
231         return out.appendNull();
232
233      if (eType == null)
234         eType = object();
235
236      ClassMeta<?> aType;        // The actual type
237      ClassMeta<?> sType;        // The serialized type
238
239      aType = push2(attrName, o, eType);
240      boolean isRecursion = aType == null;
241
242      // Handle recursion
243      if (aType == null)
244         return out.appendNull();
245
246      // Handle Optional<X>
247      if (isOptional(aType)) {
248         o = getOptionalValue(o);
249         eType = getOptionalType(eType);
250         aType = getClassMetaForObject(o, object());
251      }
252
253      sType = aType;
254      String typeName = getBeanTypeName(this, eType, aType, pMeta);
255
256      // Swap if necessary
257      ObjectSwap swap = aType.getSwap(this);
258      if (swap != null) {
259         o = swap(swap, o);
260         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
261
262         // If the getSwapClass() method returns Object, we need to figure out
263         // the actual type now.
264         if (sType.isObject())
265            sType = getClassMetaForObject(o);
266      }
267
268      // '\0' characters are considered null.
269      if (o == null || (sType.isChar() && ((Character)o).charValue() == 0))
270         out.appendNull();
271      else if (sType.isBoolean())
272         out.appendBoolean((Boolean)o);
273      else if (sType.isNumber())
274         out.appendNumber((Number)o);
275      else if (sType.isBean())
276         serializeBeanMap(out, toBeanMap(o), typeName);
277      else if (sType.isUri() || (pMeta != null && pMeta.isUri()))
278         out.appendString(resolveUri(o.toString()));
279      else if (sType.isMap()) {
280         if (o instanceof BeanMap)
281            serializeBeanMap(out, (BeanMap)o, typeName);
282         else
283            serializeMap(out, (Map)o, eType);
284      }
285      else if (sType.isCollection()) {
286         serializeCollection(out, (Collection) o, eType);
287      }
288      else if (sType.isByteArray()) {
289         out.appendBinary((byte[])o);
290      }
291      else if (sType.isArray()) {
292         serializeCollection(out, toList(sType.getInnerClass(), o), eType);
293      }
294      else if (sType.isReader()) {
295         pipe((Reader)o, out, SerializerSession::handleThrown);
296      }
297      else if (sType.isInputStream()) {
298         pipe((InputStream)o, out, SerializerSession::handleThrown);
299      }
300      else
301         out.appendString(toString(o));
302
303      if (! isRecursion)
304         pop();
305      return out;
306   }
307
308   @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes", "unchecked" })
309   private void serializeMap(MsgPackOutputStream out, Map m, ClassMeta<?> type) throws SerializeException {
310
311      ClassMeta<?> keyType = type.getKeyType(), valueType = type.getValueType();
312
313      m = sort(m);
314
315      // The map size may change as we're iterating over it, so
316      // grab a snapshot of the entries in a separate list.
317      List<SimpleMapEntry> entries = Utils.listOfSize(m.size());
318      m.forEach((k,v) -> entries.add(new SimpleMapEntry(k, v)));
319
320      out.startMap(entries.size());
321
322      entries.forEach(x -> {
323         Object value = x.value;
324         Object key = generalize(x.key, keyType);
325         serializeAnything(out, key, keyType, null, null);
326         serializeAnything(out, value, valueType, null, null);
327      });
328   }
329
330   private void serializeBeanMap(MsgPackOutputStream out, final BeanMap<?> m, String typeName) throws SerializeException {
331
332      Predicate<Object> checkNull = x -> isKeepNullProperties() || x != null;
333
334      List<BeanPropertyValue> values = new ArrayList<>();
335
336      if (typeName != null) {
337         BeanPropertyMeta pm = m.getMeta().getTypeProperty();
338         values.add(new BeanPropertyValue(pm, pm.getName(), typeName, null));
339      }
340
341      m.forEachValue(checkNull, (pMeta,key,value,thrown) -> {
342         if (thrown != null) {
343            onBeanGetterException(pMeta, thrown);
344            return;
345         }
346         BeanPropertyValue p = new BeanPropertyValue(pMeta, key, value, null);
347
348         if ((! isKeepNullProperties()) && willRecurse(p)) {
349            return; // Must handle the case where recursion occurs and property is not serialized.
350         }
351
352         values.add(p);
353      });
354
355      out.startMap(values.size());
356
357      values.forEach(x -> {
358         BeanPropertyMeta pMeta = x.getMeta();
359         if (pMeta.canRead()) {
360            ClassMeta<?> cMeta = x.getClassMeta();
361            String key = x.getName();
362            Object value = x.getValue();
363            serializeAnything(out, key, null, null, null);
364            serializeAnything(out, value, cMeta, key, pMeta);
365         }
366      });
367   }
368
369   private boolean willRecurse(BeanPropertyValue v) throws SerializeException {
370      ClassMeta<?> aType = push2(v.getName(), v.getValue(), v.getClassMeta());
371       if (aType != null)
372          pop();
373       return aType == null;
374   }
375
376   private static class SimpleMapEntry {
377      final Object key;
378      final Object value;
379
380      SimpleMapEntry(Object key, Object value) {
381         this.key = key;
382         this.value = value;
383      }
384   }
385
386   @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
387   private void serializeCollection(MsgPackOutputStream out, Collection c, ClassMeta<?> type) throws SerializeException {
388      ClassMeta<?> elementType = type.getElementType();
389      List<Object> l = Utils.listOfSize(c.size());
390      c = sort(c);
391      l.addAll(c);
392      out.startArray(l.size());
393      l.forEach(x -> serializeAnything(out, x, elementType, "<iterator>", null));
394   }
395
396   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
397   // Properties
398   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
399
400   @Override
401   protected boolean isAddBeanTypes() {
402      return ctx.isAddBeanTypes();
403   }
404}
